text:
You should use `Sec ./ (a * t)`. Right now you get a least square solution which is indeed quite surprising. Sometimes I think we are too clever..

```julia> 5 / [1.0, 2.0]
1×2 transpose(::Vector{Float64}) with eltype Float64:
 1.0  2.0

julia> 5 ./ [1.0, 2.0]
2-element Vector{Float64}:
 5.0
 2.5```

elements.text: . Right now you get a least square solution which is indeed quite surprising. Sometimes I think we are too clever..

julia> 5 / [1.0, 2.0]

 1.0  2.0

julia> 5 ./ [1.0, 2.0]

text: OK seriously would any one really miss real / array if we got rid of it?

elements.text: OK seriously would any one really miss real / array if we got rid of it?

text: Personally, I think it is way too big of a footgun, but sure, it makes some mathematical sense to have it..
